name: Kp (Current)
notes:
**This data is exactly the same as `kp.minute`, but only returns the latest value. `kp.current` is offered for convenience**.
When calling this module from the top-level endpoing (`/v2`), the key is literally `kp.minute`. It is NOT an array (e.g. `{ "kp": { "minute": {} } }`)

returns.description: The Kp reading for the given `date`

demo.name: Get Current Kp Reading
demo.description: Gets the current Kp reading. Note how `current` is NOT a property of `kp`. The key is literally `kp.current`
